meaningMnemonic: Your village wants to take the <radical>village</radical> <radical>dog</radical> and <radical>boil</radical> it, and you can think of no other response than <kanji>SHUT UP</kanji>!
readingMnemonic: The villagers are mad that you told them to <kanji>shut up</kanji>, and they start to <reading>mock</reading> (もく) you. They put their hands on their hips, lean forward, cross their eyes, and yell "SHUT UP!" back.
